original_title: The Real House Husbands of Miami
overview: Angel, Sean, Joey and Alexander are all living the high priced lifestyle in hot and beautiful Miami, thanks to the support of their wealthy wives. These four married men keep busy with Miami's sizzling social scene and a jam packed schedule of charity events and fundraising galas, but there's one thing that brings them all together....they're GAY
title: Real House Husbands of Miami
